content:
This quick guide has an in-depth guide here.
It contains a more detailed description of dialogue, cutscenes, and storyline.
Architectural Alliance/Quick guide
Released 3 March 2016 (Update)
Members Yes
Quest series Great Kourend
Developer(s) Unknown (edit)

Architectural Alliance is a miniquest centring around the architects of the five cities of Great Kourend, where the player must earn their trust to rebuild the statue of King Rada I, the first king of Great Kourend, after it was destroyed by a devastating storm.

Details[edit | edit source]

Start point Speak to Hosa in the centre of Great Kourend.
Official difficultyExperienced
DescriptionProve yourself to the five houses of Great Kourend and gain the support of several architects to rebuild the statue of King Rada I.
Official lengthLong
Requirements

Various skills depending on the favour activities done

  • 42 Mining for any Lovakengj activity
Items required
Various items depending on the favour activities done
Recommended
  • Completion of Client of Kourend; distribution of the rewarded 20% favour to Piscarilius
  • 15 Hunter for hunting sandworms
  • 25 Cooking for making stews in the Mess
  • Ability to kill large numbers of poisonous level 53-75 lizardmen and lizardman brutes
  • Kharedst's memoirs will speed up this quest significantly
Enemies to defeat Lizardmen (level 53 and 62) - optional
{"requirements":"Various skills depending on the [[favour]] activities done\n*<span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Mining\" data-level=\"42\">[[File:Mining icon.png|21x21px|link=Mining|alt=Mining]] 42 [[Mining]]</span> for any [[Lovakengj]] activity","desc":"Prove yourself to the five houses of Great Kourend and gain the support of several architects to rebuild the statue of King Rada I.","difficulty":"Experienced","kills":"[[Lizardmen]] ''(level 53 and 62) - optional''","name":"Architectural Alliance/Quick guide","start":"Speak to [[Hosa]] in the centre of [[Great Kourend]].","length":"Long","items":"Various items depending on the favour activities done"}

Walkthrough[edit | edit source]

Starting out[edit | edit source]

  • Speak with Hosa by the statue of King Rada I in Great Kourend to start the miniquest. ( 1)…
    1Can I help?

Gaining favour[edit | edit source]

  • Gain 100% favour with Arceuus.
    • Assist library customers in the Arceuus Library until you have 90% Arceuus Favour (continue searching for books until you find Transportation incantations to unlock the Kourend Castle Teleport spell).
    • Complete The Ascent of Arceuus for the final 10% of favour.
  • Gain 100% favour with Hosidius.
    • Plough the fields in Hosidius until you reach 5% (bring a hammer).
    • Buy 850 saltpetre and compost and combine them together. Place them in your bank and talk to Clerk to reach 90% favour.
    • Complete The Depths of Despair for the remaining 10% favour.
  • Gain 100% favour with Lovakengj.
    • Mine volcanic sulphur until you reach 65% favour (bring a face mask, gas mask or slayer helmet).
    • Complete The Forsaken Tower for an additional 10% favour.
    • Talk to Miriam and deliver the five minecart control scrolls to the minecart operators to reach 100% favour.
  • Gain 100% favour with Port Piscarilius.
    • Complete Client of Kourend. Distribute the rewarded 20% favour to Piscarilius.
    • Complete The Queen of Thieves for another 10%.
    • Hunt sandworms until you reach 100% in Piscarilius.
  • Gain 100% favour with Shayzien.
    • Heal wounded soldiers in the Shayzien infirmary until you have 5% favour in Shayzien.
    • Kill lizardmen until you reach 30% in Shayzien (try to obtain Xeric's talisman by killing lizardmen if you haven't already).
    • Complete Tale of the Righteous for another 10%.
    • At 40% favour, tackle organised crime until you reach 100% favour. It is much faster than killing lizardmen, and you can hop worlds once you find a meeting to easily earn more favour.

Architects[edit | edit source]

  • Speak with Arcis after earning 100% favour with Arceuus.
  • Speak with Hosa after earning 100% favour with Hosidius.
  • Speak with Lovada after earning 100% favour with Lovakengj.
  • Speak with Piliar after earning 100% favour with Port Piscarilius.
  • Speak with Shayda after earning 100% favour with Shayzien.

Finishing up[edit | edit source]

  • Speak with one of the architects at the statue of King Rada I.

Congratulations, miniquest complete!

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Antique lamp that grants 10,000 experience in a skill of your choice above level 40. This can be claimed by speaking to Hosa. This reward was added on 7 February 2019 and players who have completed the miniquest prior to this date will also be able to claim this lamp from Hosa.
  • Access to Xeric's Heart teleport on Xeric's talisman, which teleports players to the statue. Doing so is a task for the hard Kourend & Kebos Diary.

'''Architectural Alliance''' is a [[miniquest]] centring around the architects of the five cities of [[Great Kourend]], where the player must earn their trust to rebuild the statue of [[King Rada I]], the first king of Great Kourend, after it was destroyed by a devastating storm.

==Details==
{{Quest details page|Architectural Alliance}}

==Walkthrough==
===Starting out===
{{Checklist|
*Speak with [[Hosa]] by the statue of King Rada I in [[Great Kourend]] to start the miniquest. {{Chat option|1Can I help?}}}}

===Gaining favour===
{{Checklist|
*Gain 100% [[favour]] with [[Arceuus]].
**Assist library customers in the [[Arceuus Library]] until you have 90% Arceuus Favour (continue searching for books until you find [[Transportation incantations]] to unlock the [[Kourend Castle Teleport]] spell).
**Complete [[The Ascent of Arceuus]] for the final 10% of favour. 
*Gain 100% [[favour]] with [[Hosidius]].
**Plough the fields in Hosidius until you reach 5% (bring a hammer).
**Buy 850 [[saltpetre]] and [[compost]] and combine them together. Place them in your bank and talk to [[Clerk (Hosidius)|Clerk]] to reach 90% favour.
**Complete [[The Depths of Despair]] for the remaining 10% favour.
*Gain 100% [[favour]] with [[Lovakengj]].
**Mine [[volcanic sulphur]] until you reach 65% favour (bring a [[face mask]], [[gas mask]] or [[slayer helmet]]).
**Complete [[The Forsaken Tower]] for an additional 10% favour.
**Talk to [[Miriam]] and deliver the five [[minecart control scroll]]s to the [[Lovakengj Minecart Network|minecart operators]] to reach 100% favour.
*Gain 100% [[favour]] with [[Port Piscarilius]].
** Complete [[Client of Kourend]]. Distribute the rewarded 20% favour to Piscarilius.
**Complete [[The Queen of Thieves]] for another 10%.
**Hunt [[sandworms]] until you reach 100% in Piscarilius.
*Gain 100% [[favour]] with [[Shayzien]].
**Heal [[wounded soldier]]s in the Shayzien infirmary until you have 5% favour in Shayzien.
**Kill [[lizardmen]] until you reach 30% in Shayzien (try to obtain [[Xeric's talisman]] by killing lizardmen if you haven't already).
**Complete [[Tale of the Righteous]] for another 10%.
**At 40% favour, [[tackle organised crime]] until you reach 100% favour. It is much faster than killing lizardmen, and you can hop worlds once you find a meeting to easily earn more favour.}}

===Architects===
{{Checklist|
*Speak with [[Arcis]] after earning 100% favour with [[Arceuus]].
*Speak with [[Hosa]] after earning 100% favour with [[Hosidius]].
*Speak with [[Lovada]] after earning 100% favour with [[Lovakengj]].
*Speak with [[Piliar]] after earning 100% favour with [[Port Piscarilius]].
*Speak with [[Shayda]] after earning 100% favour with [[Shayzien]].}}

===Finishing up===
{{Checklist|
*Speak with one of the architects at the statue of King Rada I.}}
'''Congratulations, miniquest complete!'''

==Rewards==
* [[Antique lamp (Architectural Alliance)|Antique lamp]] that grants 10,000 experience in a skill of your choice above level 40. This can be claimed by speaking to [[Hosa]]. ''This reward was added on [[7 February]] [[2019]] and players who have completed the miniquest prior to this date will also be able to claim this lamp from Hosa.''
* Access to Xeric's Heart teleport on [[Xeric's talisman]], which teleports players to the statue. Doing so is a task for the [[hard Kourend & Kebos Diary]].

{{Architectural Alliance}}
